column1: Artificial Intelligence for Science & Technology (Joint Degree)
column5: The MSc Artificial Intelligence for Science & Technology is jointly offered by the University of Milan-Bicocca, Milan Statale and Pavia entirely in English. The Applications are open till 8 September 2023. The Master's program ï»¿offers a 360-degree and inter-disciplinary approach to studying artificial intelligence. Students will learn to apply AI effectively in the pursuit of innovative solutions within the fields of science and technology.
